languages.text: {n}В лезвии ножа вы видите отражение своего лица. Выхода нет. Хорошо лишь то, что ваше знакомство с жизнью черни оказалось совсем недолгим...{/n}
{n}You see your new reflection in the blade of the cleaver. There is no way out. At least this foray into the life of Thasserian peasantry has been a short one...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В лезвии ножа вы видите отражение своего лица. Выхода нет. Хорошо лишь то, что ваше знакомство с жизнью черни оказалось совсем недолгим...{/n}

languages.text: {n}通过切肉刀的刀刃，你看到了你新躯体的倒影。你已经无路可走了，看来你身为塔瑟拉农奴的新生活，很快就要结束了……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see your new reflection in the blade of the cleaver. There is no way out. At least this foray into the life of Thasserian peasantry has been a short one...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}通过切肉刀的刀刃，你看到了你新躯体的倒影。你已经无路可走了，看来你身为塔瑟拉农奴的新生活，很快就要结束了……{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ves tu nuevo reflejo en la hoja del cuchillo. No hay escapatoria. Al menos tu incursión en la vida de la plebe thasseriana ha sido breve...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see your new reflection in the blade of the cleaver. There is no way out. At least this foray into the life of Thasserian peasantry has been a short one...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ves tu nuevo reflejo en la hoja del cuchillo. No hay escapatoria. Al menos tu incursión en la vida de la plebe thasseriana ha sido breve...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Satırın bıçağında yeni yansımanı görüyorsun. Kaçman mümkün değil. En azından Thassera avamının hayatına yaptığın bu yolculuk kısa sürüyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see your new reflection in the blade of the cleaver. There is no way out. At least this foray into the life of Thasserian peasantry has been a short one...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Satırın bıçağında yeni yansımanı görüyorsun. Kaçman mümkün değil. En azından Thassera avamının hayatına yaptığın bu yolculuk kısa sürüyor...{/n}

languages.text: {n}大包丁の刃に新しい兆候を見る。逃げ場がない。少なくともこのタッセーラの農民の人生への船出は短いものだった…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see your new reflection in the blade of the cleaver. There is no way out. At least this foray into the life of Thasserian peasantry has been a short one...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}大包丁の刃に新しい兆候を見る。逃げ場がない。少なくともこのタッセーラの農民の人生への船出は短いものだった…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous voyez votre propre reflet dans la lame du fendoir. Vous n'avez aucune issue. Au moins, cette incursion dans la vie paysanne thasserienne aura été de courte durée...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see your new reflection in the blade of the cleaver. There is no way out. At least this foray into the life of Thasserian peasantry has been a short one...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous voyez votre propre reflet dans la lame du fendoir. Vous n'avez aucune issue. Au moins, cette incursion dans la vie paysanne thasserienne aura été de courte durée...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du siehst auf der Klinge des Beils dein neues Spiegelbild. Es gibt keinen Ausweg. Wenigstens war dieser Ausflug in das Leben einer armen Thasserianerin kurz ...{/n}
